sentences.en: a discussion of marriage from the standpoint of women
sentences.cn: 从女性角度对婚姻的探讨

sentences.en: But from the standpoint of a person, they are perfectly normal.
sentences.cn: 但从人类用户的角度来看, 这些太正常了.

sentences.en: First, the internal driving power of charity is analyzed from macroeconomics standpoint.
sentences.cn: 首先是宏观分析,阐述企业慈善的内在驱动力.

sentences.en: From a practical standpoint, rill erosion forms small channels.
sentences.cn: 从实用的观点看, 细沟侵蚀能形成很小的渠槽.

sentences.en: From a styling standpoint, the Mazda 6 makes a distinctive exterior statement.
sentences.cn: 从外形设计的角度来看, 马自达6的确是非常出众.

sentences.en: From my standpoint, this thing is just ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 依我看来, 这件事简直荒唐.

sentences.en: From my standpoint, you know, this thing is just ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 你要知道，依我看，这事简直太荒唐了。

sentences.en: From the standpoint of expense, the underlying principle applicable to planning is simple.
sentences.cn: 从费用的观点看, 适用于规划的基本原理是简单的.

sentences.en: From the standpoint of this work, this is an extreme point of view which is inapplicable.
sentences.cn: 从本书的观点来看, 这是一种不适用的,极端的观点.

sentences.en: From this standpoint the city is an elevation, rising from the ground like a mountain.
sentences.cn: 从这一观点来看,城市是个象山岳一样的自地面升起的突出物.

sentences.en: He will never be bullied into any change of his standpoint.
sentences.cn: 要想硬逼他改变自己的立场是办不到的.

sentences.en: I saw myself , too, from the dramatic standpoint.
sentences.cn: 我也从做戏的角度看待自己.

sentences.en: One's opinion tends to differ in accordance with one's standpoint.
sentences.cn: 不同的立场势必形成不同的见解.

sentences.en: This argument is untenable from an intellectual, moral and practical standpoint.
sentences.cn: 从智识、道德和现实的角度来看，这一论点是站不住脚的。

sentences.en: We should look at this from a historical standpoint.
sentences.cn: 我们应从历史的观点看待这事.

sentences.en: Yeasts traditionally and It'still plays an important role from a technical and industrial standpoint.
sentences.cn: 从古代到今天,它在技术和工业上都起着重要作用.

phrases.tran_cn: 从…角度来看；从…立场来看

trans.tran_en: a way of thinking about people, situations, ideas etc
